## 🤖 Agent Mode — Power Prompt {data-background="#1a1a2e"}

### 🎯 Comprehensive Agent Task
```markdown
"Act as a research agent with these objectives:

GOAL: Analyze top 6 HRIS systems for Pakistani SMEs

STEPS:
1. Research and identify 6 leading HRIS platforms
2. Gather pricing, features, and localization support
3. Create comparison matrix in CSV format
4. Generate executive summary (500 words)
5. Build 5-slide presentation with key findings

CONSTRAINTS:
- Focus on 50-500 employee companies
- Include PKR pricing where available
- Highlight compliance with Pakistani labor laws

DELIVERABLES:
- Comparison CSV
- Executive summary
- Slide deck with visualizations

Confirm each step before proceeding."
```

## 🧠 Think Longer — Optimization Example {data-background="#2c3e50"}

### 🚀 Algorithm Optimization Challenge
```markdown
"Think step-by-step to optimize this problem:

Current: O(n²) nested loop for finding pairs
Goal: Achieve O(n log n) or better

Requirements:
1. Explore 2-3 different algorithmic approaches
2. Analyze time/space complexity for each
3. Consider edge cases and constraints
4. Provide benchmarking estimates
5. Recommend the most robust solution

Take your time to consider all trade-offs before 
presenting the final optimized solution with 
implementation details."
```

::: {.fragment style="margin-top: 30px; font-size: 1.3em; text-align: center; color: white;"}
**10x thinking time = 100x solution quality**
:::

## 🔍 Deep Research — Master Prompt {data-background="#11998e"}

### 🎯 Comprehensive Research Request
```markdown
"Conduct deep research on Pakistan's FY2025 fiscal strategy:

RESEARCH SCOPE:
- Revenue generation mechanisms & tax reforms
- Subsidy restructuring plans
- Inflation impact projections
- IMF program compliance
- Private sector implications

REQUIREMENTS:
- Use minimum 10 diverse sources
- Include government, IMF, and independent analysis
- Highlight areas of disagreement between sources
- Provide confidence levels (High/Medium/Low)

DELIVERABLES:
1. Executive summary (500 words)
2. Evidence matrix (claim → source → confidence)
3. Key metrics dashboard
4. Risk assessment table
5. Full bibliography with links

Focus on actionable insights for policy makers."
```

## 🛡️ Quality & Safety Framework {data-background="#2c3e50" .scrollable}

### Five Pillars of Responsible AI

::: {.timeline}
### 1. Model Selection & Routing
- Choose appropriate capability level
- Balance speed vs. accuracy needs
- A/B test for optimal results
:::

::: {.timeline}
### 2. Hallucination Prevention
- Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)
- Explicit uncertainty calibration
- Post-generation verification
:::

::: {.timeline}
### 3. Avoiding Sycophancy
- Instruction hierarchy enforcement
- Encourage useful disagreement
- Evidence-based corrections
:::

---

## Safety Measures (Continued) {data-background="#2c3e50"}

::: {.timeline}
### 4. Safe Completions
- Policy-aware refusals with alternatives
- PII/medical/legal guardrails
- Continuous red-team testing
:::

::: {.timeline}
### 5. Deception Detection
- Evidence-first responses
- Transparent tool usage logs
- Cross-source verification
:::

::: {.fragment}
### 🔍 Continuous Monitoring

- Log all interactions and tool usage
- Review high-risk sessions
- Human-in-the-loop for sensitive domains
- Rapid iteration on failure modes
:::

## Appendix: Custom CSS {.smaller .scrollable}

```css
/* custom-styles.css */
.reveal h1, .reveal h2 {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  font-weight: 800;
}

/* Scrollable content */
.scrollable {
  height: 600px;
  overflow-y: auto;
  padding: 20px;
}

/* Background handling */
.reveal .slides section[data-background] {
  color: white;
}

.reveal .slides section[data-background] h1,
.reveal .slides section[data-background] h2,
.reveal .slides section[data-background] h3 {
  color: white;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

/* Timeline styling */
.timeline {
  border-left: 3px solid #667eea;
  padding-left: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  position: relative;
}

.timeline::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: -8px;
  top: 0;
  width: 12px;
  height: 12px;
  background: #667eea;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* Table styling */
.reveal table {
  font-size: 0.9em;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  width: 100%;
  margin: auto;
}

.reveal table th,
.reveal table td {
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  padding: 10px;
  text-align: left;
}

.reveal table th {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  color: white;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.reveal table tr:hover td {
  background-color: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1);
}

/* Code block styling */
.reveal pre {
  font-size: 0.8em;
  line-height: 1.3em;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
  border-radius: 8px;
}

.reveal code {
  background: #2d2d2d;
  color: #f8f8f2;
  padding: 3px 8px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

/* Column spacing */
.reveal .columns {
  display: flex;
  gap: 25px;
  align-items: flex-start;
}

/* Incremental lists */
.reveal .incremental li {
  margin: 12px 0;
}

/* Fragment animation */
.reveal .fragment {
  opacity: 0;
}

.reveal .fragment.visible {
  opacity: 1;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}

/* Center content */
.reveal .center {
  text-align: center;
}

/* Better padding */
.reveal .slides section {
  padding: 25px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Responsive sizing */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .reveal .slides section {
    font-size: 0.85em;
    padding: 15px;
  }
  
  .reveal .columns {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
}

/* Special text effects */
.text-gradient {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  font-weight: bold;
}

/* Notes styling */
.reveal .notes {
  font-style: italic;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 0.9em;
}

/* Emphasis box */
.emphasis-box {
  padding: 20px;
  margin: 20px 0;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1) 0%, rgba(118, 75, 162, 0.1) 100%);
  border-left: 4px solid #667eea;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

/* Quote styling */
.reveal blockquote {
  border-left: 4px solid #667eea;
  padding-left: 20px;
  font-style: italic;
  color: #555;
  margin: 20px 0;
}
```
